Class ExtractGlimpse.Inputs

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOpInputs<ExtractGlimpse>
org.tensorflow.op.image.ExtractGlimpse.Inputs
Enclosing class:
ExtractGlimpse
public static class ExtractGlimpse.Inputs extends RawOpInputs<ExtractGlimpse>

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final boolean
    centered
    indicates if the offset coordinates are centered relative to the image, in which case the (0, 0) offset is relative to the center of the input images.
    final Operand<TFloat32>
    input
    A 4-D float tensor of shape [batch_size, height, width, channels].
    final String
    noise
    indicates if the noise should uniform, gaussian, or zero.
    final boolean
    normalized
    indicates if the offset coordinates are normalized.
    final Operand<TFloat32>
    offsets
    A 2-D integer tensor of shape [batch_size, 2] containing the y, x locations of the center of each window.
    final Operand<TInt32>
    sizeOutput
    A 1-D tensor of 2 elements containing the size of the glimpses to extract.
    final boolean
    uniformNoise
    indicates if the noise should be generated using a uniform distribution or a Gaussian distribution.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class RawOpInputs

    attributeMetadata, attributeNames, attributes, attributeValue, attributeValues, equals, getOutputs, hashCode, toString

    Methods inherited from class Object

  • Field Details

    • input

      public final Operand<TFloat32> input
      A 4-D float tensor of shape [batch_size, height, width, channels].

    • sizeOutput

      public final Operand<TInt32> sizeOutput
      A 1-D tensor of 2 elements containing the size of the glimpses to extract. The glimpse height must be specified first, following by the glimpse width.

    • offsets

      public final Operand<TFloat32> offsets
      A 2-D integer tensor of shape [batch_size, 2] containing the y, x locations of the center of each window.

    • centered

      public final boolean centered
      indicates if the offset coordinates are centered relative to the image, in which case the (0, 0) offset is relative to the center of the input images. If false, the (0,0) offset corresponds to the upper left corner of the input images.

    • normalized

      public final boolean normalized
      indicates if the offset coordinates are normalized.

    • uniformNoise

      public final boolean uniformNoise
      indicates if the noise should be generated using a uniform distribution or a Gaussian distribution.

    • noise

      public final String noise
      indicates if the noise should uniform, gaussian, or zero. The default is uniform which means the noise type will be decided by uniform_noise.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inputs

      public Inputs(GraphOperation op)
